title: phac-nml/arboratornf pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces.

sample_name.errorMessage: Sample name is optional, if provided will replace sample for filenames and outputs

mlst_alleles.errorMessage: MLST JSON file from locidex report. The file path cannot contain spaces and must have one of the following extensions: '.mlst.json', '.mlst.json.gz', '.mlst.subtyping.json', or '.mlst.subtyping.json.gz'.

metadata_partition.errorMessage: Metadata column used to partition clusters. Must contain only alphanumeric, underscore, period, and dash characters.

metadata_1.errorMessage: Metadata associated with the sample (metadata_1). Cannot contain newlines, tabs, backslash, or double quotes
